text: Mantura is a genus of beetles in the family Chrysomelidae.Chrysomelidae in "Synopsis of the described Coleoptera of the World". 13 December 2008. == Species == * Mantura ambigua (Kutschera, 1862) * Mantura chrysanthemi (Koch, 1903) – common in England, Turkey, Algeria, Morocco. * Mantura cylindrica (Miller, 1880) * Mantura horioni (Heikertinger, 1940) * Mantura lutea (Allard, 1859) * Mantura matthewsi (Stephens, 1832) – common in Slovakia and Turkey. * Mantura nepala (Medvedev, 2004) * Mantura obtusata (Gyllenhal, 1813) – can be found nearly everywhere in Europe. * Mantura rustica (Linnaeus, 1766) == References == Category:Chrysomelidae
title: Mantura (beetle)
